      • enableWlc

        public void enableWlc​(INxpWlcCallBack callback)
               throws java.io.IOException
        This api is called by applications to Enable Wireless charging.

        Requires android.Manifest.permission#NFC permission.

        • This api shall be called only after Nfcservice is enabled.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any exception occurs during this operation

      • disableWlc

        public void disableWlc​(INxpWlcCallBack callback)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This api is called by applications to Disable Wireless charging.

        Requires android.Manifest.permission#NFC permission.

        • This api shall be called only after Nfcservice is enabled.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any exception occurs during this operation

      • isWlcEnabled

        public boolean isWlcEnabled()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This api is called by applications to check if wireless charging is enabled.

        Requires android.Manifest.permission#NFC permission.

        • This api shall be called only after Nfcservice is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if WlcPolling is Enabled else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any exception occurs during this operation
